item.title: I need a little help
item.dc:creator: @dagger9090 dagger9090
item.description:
@dagger9090 wrote:

Now my compiler says you do not have java installed, but I do … so what now if you have a code for a better compiler then please post it maybe a new one will work…
Also I do not have my variables and paths set Can some one tell me how to do that…

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
